title: Galaxy S22 series skips out on Android’s Seamless Updates feature
content:
Samsung’s new Galaxy S22 series offers impressive hardware with a promise of four years of guaranteed OS upgrades. However, it appears the new phones don’t have the ability to swiftly install new software updates, lagging behind the likes of the Pixel 6. According to 9to5Google, the Galaxy S22 series doesn’t support Android’s “Seamless Updates” feature.

The post Galaxy S22 series skips out on Android’s Seamless Updates feature appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Galaxy S22 series doesn’t support Android’s "Seamless Updates" feature just like previous Galaxy phones. Read on.
